title: Brian Cox | Republicans Want to Make Trump Speaker of the House if They Win in 2022: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at a growing number of Republicans, including Congressman Matt Gaetz, pushing to make Donald Trump Speaker of the House if they retake power in 2022, while focusing on big issues like Hot Pocket prices and cream cheese shortages.

Then, Brian Cox talks about the depth of his character on Succession, how he approaches each of his roles and working with Jeremy Strong's different acting methods.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
